meanings.sent1: The puppy was so lively and lusty, always running around the yard.
meanings.sent2: She felt lusty and full of energy after a good night's sleep.
meanings.sent3: The lusty squirrel raced up the tree with impressive speed.
meanings.sent4: The lusty engine roared to life, ready for the long journey ahead.
meanings.sent5: The lusty waves crashed against the shore with powerful force.

meanings.sent1: The old tree stood tall and lusty in the middle of the forest.
meanings.sent2: After a week of rest, she felt lusty and ready to take on any challenge.
meanings.sent3: The lusty horse galloped gracefully across the field, showing its strength.
meanings.sent4: The lusty oak tree provided shade and shelter to all the animals in the woods.
meanings.sent5: The lusty lion's roar echoed through the savanna, a sign of its health and power.
